categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Far Needle Theta was the callsign attributed to a Rebel Alliance starfighter pilot. While flying near the jumping-off point to the hyperlane Terrabe Bypass to Jedha, the pilot spotted an unidentified construct defended by an Imperial task force of capital ships and TIE/ln space superiority starfighter pickets. Far Needle Theta broke off contact to avoid capture and loss of intelligence data.
